name: Space Adventure (itch) (startravellers)
description:
Welcome to our entry for the Game Jam 2021 AD. This tiny first-person space shooter will take you across a couple of regions and put you face to face with some of the most annoying enemies of the galaxy. 

You'll be hunting different types of enemies lurking in procedurally generated asteroid fields just waiting to take you down! But beware! There are mines all around the place as well! And they can cause a lot of damage to your ship...

Hope you can enjoy our game and play it until the end!

Commands:

Movement: WASD and Mouse

Roll: QE

Boost: Shift

Shooting: Left mouse click

Selecting weapons: Mouse wheel

Rocket: Mouse wheel (middle button) click

Look around: Right mouse click

----

We are The Star Travellers Entertainment indie. When working with the space theme we really felt like we were at home... I mean, in the stars! We don't have a big team, we're just a couple of friends who really like the game world. Edmar Souza is a Developer and acts as Game Developer and Michelle Melo is a publicist and acts as Game Designer in her spare time. We hope you enjoy the game we created at this Jam and help us win first place! 

Greetings and until next time. The Star Travellers.
